text: Liverpool is a lakeside village in Onondaga County, New York, United States. The population was 2,242 at the 2020 census. The name was named from the city of Liverpool in the United Kingdom. The village is on Onondaga Lake, in the western part of the town of Salina and is northwest of Syracuse, of which it is a suburb. ==References== Category:Villages in New York (state)
title: Liverpool, New York
